text.author: Wikinews
text.title: Pop culture celebrated at Fan Expo Canada 2016 in Toronto
text.summary: The 2016 Fan Expo in Toronto, Canada, was attended by thousands, including many cosplayers, with appearances from celebrities such as Stan Lee, Mark Hamill and Margaret Atwood, video game demos, an Esports championship and charity events.
